meanings.sent1: My grandma hopes to outliver all her friends.
meanings.sent2: The tortoise managed to outliver the hare in the race.
meanings.sent3: It would be quite a feat to outliver a vampire!
meanings.sent4: Her memories outlive her, like echoes in an empty room.
meanings.sent5: The ancient tree seemed to outlive time itself.

meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins outliver any modern building.
meanings.sent2: Healthy habits can help you outlive your peers.
meanings.sent3: The old watch outlived all its siblings in the drawer.
meanings.sent4: His legacy will outlive him, a testament to his greatness.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range outlives the passing clouds.

meanings.sent1: She hopes to outlive her pet goldfish.
meanings.sent2: The ancient oak tree will likely outlive us all.
meanings.sent3: The battery somehow managed to outlive its warranty.
meanings.sent4: His love for her will outlive any obstacle.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins outlive the stories told about them.
